channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-16730] Vectorization: Schema Evolution for Text Vectorization / Complex Types
item.description: With HIVE-16589: "Vectorization: Support Complex Types and GroupBy modes PARTIAL2, FINAL, and COMPLETE for AVG" change, the tests schema_evol_text_vec_part_all_complex.q and schema_evol_text_vecrow_part_all_complex.q fail.
item.summary: Vectorization: Schema Evolution for Text Vectorization / Complex Types

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: This patch makes HIVE-16589 able to evolve schema in complex types. However, column c5 of the last record in schema_evol_text_vec_part_all_complex.q.out becomes null, not 1255178165 after applying HIVE-16730 on HIVE-16589. I think that it's related with LazySimpleDeserializeRead or LazySimpleSerializeWrite.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12870728/HIVE-16730.1.patch

ERROR: -1 due to no test(s) being added or modified.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12876439 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

This third patch fixes a bug in LazySimpleDeserializeRead. It tried to parse the last column in a struct column with its data and following additional data, too. This patch makes LazySimpleDeserializeRead read the last column in a struct column with its column data only.

Here are the results of testing the latest attachment:
https://issues.apache.org/jira/secure/attachment/12876497/HIVE-16730.3.patch
